timeline.bodyText: You can just create this field with List<String> fields = conf.getFields() == null ?  ... : ... to avoid the if else block
timeline.author: yaojiefeng
yaojiefeng

replies.bodyText: That won't work since conf.getFields() returns an Iterable, and there's no ArrayList constructor that converts an Iterable to a list.
replies.author: vravish

timeline.bodyText: just create a keep list using new ArrayList<>(fieldsToKeep)
timeline.author: yaojiefeng

timeline.bodyText:
for drops, if the fieldsToKeep is not empty, any field that is not in the keep list is dropped. See 
  
    
      hydrator-plugins/core-plugins/src/main/java/io/cdap/plugin/transform/ProjectionTransform.java
    
    
        Lines 175 to 176
      in
      087c35d
    
    
    
    

        
          
           if (!fieldsToKeep.isEmpty() && !fieldsToKeep.contains(inputFieldName)) { 
        

        
          
               continue;
timeline.author: yaojiefeng
